### Your name

Jane Smith

### What's the toil?

I manually copy deploy logs from our CI system into a shared spreadsheet after every release. Takes ~45 minutes per release and I have to verify links manually.

### Automation idea (if any)

A GitHub Action triggered on release events could auto-format and post deploy logs.
